articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Pak Pyong Sik
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Pak Pyong Sik
Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un Tuesday sent a wreath to the bier of Prof. and Dr. Pak Pyong Sik, winner of the Kim Il Sung Prize, labor hero, researcher and teacher at Kim Il Sung University of Politics, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: Greetings to Political Party of DR Congo
articles.content:
Greetings to Political Party of DR Congo
Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea on Wednesday sent a message of greeting to the National Executive Committee of the People's Party for the Reconstruction and the Democracy of DR Congo on the occasion of the 14th anniversary of its founding.
					 The message expressed the belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two parties would grow stronger to meet the interests of the peoples of the two countries.
					
					 It wished the party of DR Congo bigger success in its work for consolidating itself and achieving socio-political stability, national unity and the country's prosperity.

articles.title: Peruvian Political Party Presents Diplomas of Feats to Peerlessly Great Men of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Peruvian Political Party Presents Diplomas of Feats to Peerlessly Great Men of Mt. Paektu
Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un were awarded diplomas of feats by the Socialist Political Action Party of Peru on the occasion of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 A ceremony of conveying the diplomas was held in Lima on March 23.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were members of the leadership of the party and the DPRK ambassador to Peru and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 The international secretary who is acting general secretary of the party conveyed the diplomas to the ambassador.

articles.title: 9th Plenary Meeting of 13th SPA Presidium Held
articles.content:
9th Plenary Meeting of 13th SPA Presidium Held
Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The 9th plenary meeting of the 13th Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) of the DPRK took place at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.
					 The plenary meeting was attended by members of the SPA Presidium.
					
					 Officials concerned were present there as observers.
					
					 Discussed at the meeting were review of the implementation of the state budget for Juche 104 (2015) of the DPRK and the state budget for Juche 105 (2016).
					
					 A report was made at the meeting.
					
					 According to the report, the state budget for last year was correctly carried out.
					
					 The plan for state budgetary revenue was over-fulfilled 1.3 percent or an increase of 5 percent over the previous year.
					
					 The plan for local budgetary revenue was fulfilled at 113.8 percent while that for state budgetary expenditure was carried out at 99.9 percent.
					
					 15.9 percent of the total expenditure was allocated for national defence while 47.5 percent for building an economic power and the improvement of the standard of people's living.
					
					 Investment in the fields of science and technology showed a 4.7 percent increase over that last year.
					
					 36.6 percent of the total expenditure was earmarked for cultural construction including education, public health, sports and literature and arts.
					
					 The state budgetary revenue for this year is expected to go up 4.1 percent out of which transaction revenue will hold 3.3 percent, the revenue from the profits of state enterprises 4.5 percent, the revenue from the profits of cooperative enterprises 1.5 percent, that from real estate rent 4 percent, that from social insurance 1.1 percent, that from the sale of properties and price difference 2.5 percent and other revenue 1.3 percent. The revenue from economic trade zone is expected to grow 4.1 percent.
					
					 Out of the state budgetary revenue the national budgetary revenue will account for 76.8 percent while that from local areas 23.2 percent.
					
					 The state budgetary expenditure is expected to go up 5.6 percent over last year out of which 4.8 percent will go to industries, 4.3 percent to agriculture, 6.9 percent to fisheries, 13.7 percent to capital construction and 7.5 percent to forestry.
					
					 It was decided to increase expenditure in the field of science and technology 5.2 percent, the field of education 8.1 percent, the field of public health 3.8 percent, the field of sports 4.1 percent and the field of culture 7.4 percent.
					
					 15.8 percent of the total expenditure will be spent for national defence.
					
					 A large amount of educational aid fund and stipends will be sent for the education of Korean children in Japan.
					
					 A decision of the Presidium of the SPA "On approving the review of the fulfillment of the Juche 104 (2015) state budget of the DPRK" and a decree of the Presidium of the SPA "On the Juche 105 (2016) state budget of the DPRK" were adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: U.S., Park Geun Hye Regime's Monstrous Crimes Can Never Be Pardoned: Spokesman for CFK Central Committee
articles.content:
U.S., Park Geun Hye Regime's Monstrous Crimes Can Never Be Pardoned: Spokesman for CFK Central Committee
Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Christian Federation of Korea (CFK) Wednesday made public a statement denouncing the hideous provocation perpetrated by the U.S. imperialists and the Park Geun Hye group of traitors of south Korea.
					 The U.S. and the Park regime did not hesitate to perpetrate hideous provocations such as "beheading operation" and "precision strike drill" aimed to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and "bring down its social system" with special groups of man-killers who earned ill-fame in various parts of the world and lethal means involved, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 All Christians in the DPRK have turned out in the final decisive battle together with all service personnel and other people to frustrate the provocation of the U.S. imperialists and the Park group of traitors and defend the supreme dignity of the nation and socialist system as firm as a rock.
					
					 We can never pardon the group of traitors in their moves to hurt the sacred dignity of the country and nation.
					
					 All Christians in south Korea should turn out in the sacred battle to decisively punish the Satan band wrecking peace and bringing nuclear disaster to this land just like Saint Paul who loved fellow countrymen so much and Esther who devotedly saved the nation from the danger.
					
					 The CFK Central Committee expresses expectation that the Christian organizations and Christians of various countries of the world valuing love, justice and peace would wage a positive solidarity movement to foil the reckless moves of the U.S. and Park group of traitors to bring the danger of a nuclear war not only to the Korean peninsula but the rest of the world through hideous provocations.

articles.title: Korean Student Committee Vows to Punish Enemies
articles.content:
Korean Student Committee Vows to Punish Enemies
Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Korean Student Committee made public a statement Wednesday.
					 It is the unanimous retaliatory will and voices of anger to wipe out all the murderous equipment or special operation force of the U.S. imperialists and the Park Geun Hye group desperately trying to get the great sun of Songun Korea eclipsed, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Now juvenile students join the Young Red Guards, graduates from senior secondary schools vie with each other in volunteering to join the Korean People's Army (KPA) and university students-discharged soldiers volunteer to rejoin the KPA.
					
					 Millions of students are turning out as one in the battle to devotedly defend the leader and the motherland as they keenly feel that schools and rosy future are protected thanks to the great sun.
					
					 It is the invariable faith and will of youth and students to become human bombs and bullets in the battle for devotedly protecting the supreme headquarters of the revolution.
					
					 All the youth and students will mercilessly punish the vicious enemies running amuck to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and the socialist motherland and fully display the unrivaled bravery and spirit in the operation for liberating the southern half of Korea to achieve the historical cause of national reunification once an order for a final decisive battle is issued.

articles.title: National Martial Art Championship for Mangyongdae Prize Opens
articles.content:
National Martial Art Championship for Mangyongdae Prize Opens
Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The National Martial Art Championship for Mangyongdae Prize opened with due ceremony at the Basketball Gymnasium in Pyongyang on Wednesday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 It brought together more than 600 men and women players selected from 24 organizations including Taekwon-Do teams. They will compete in Taekwon-Do, go and other events at the Holy Taekwon-Do Hall.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Choe Ryong Hae, Ro Tu Chol, officials concerned, players, coaches and working people in the city.
					
					 After the opening ceremony there were demonstrations by the players of the Taekwon-Do team of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee.

articles.title: National Reunification Institute Issues Detailed Report
articles.content:
National Reunification Institute Issues Detailed Report
Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The service personnel and people of the DPRK are significantly observing the third anniversary of the DPRK's line of simultaneously building up the economy and nuclear force.
					 The National Reunification Institute Wednesday made public a detailed report telling about the justice and invincibility of the line through voices of international community and south Korean people startling the world through the declaration of the above-said line.
					
					 The report said:
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un wisely led the drive for bolstering up the nuclear force, boldly foiling the moves of the U.S. and its followers to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 He set forth the line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force at the plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) in March of 2013.
					
					 Then, he indicated the orientation of strengthening the nuclear force and provided a legal foundation for doing so by legitimizing the bolstering of the nuclear force for self-defence and discussing and settling the practical matters of developing more Korean-style cutting-edge weapons and equipment and consolidating the defence capability of the country in every way at a meeting of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and an enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission of the WPK.
					
					 Under his wise leadership the DPRK has achieved miraculous successes startling the world one after another in the building of Juche-oriented nuclear force.
					
					 The DPRK succeeded in the H-bomb test in January this year, in particular, fully demonstrating its might as a nuclear power in the world.
					
					 Some days ago, the actual miniaturized nuclear warheads manufactured by scientists and technicians in the field of research into nuclear weapons were opened to public, startling the world people again.
					
					 The report referred to the fact that the international community and people of different social standings in south Korea recognized the DPRK's nuclear capability and expressed admiration at this. It went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Un at the plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the WPK held in March, 2013 indicated tasks and ways to channel great efforts into stepping up the economic construction and improving the standard of people's living while further bolstering up the country's defense capability with less expense without increasing the defense expenditure, and wisely led the drive for carrying out them.
					
					 Under his energetic leadership, the people's dreams and ideals have come true on this land and miracles and events heralding the omen of prosperity have taken place one after another in the DPRK over the past three years.
					
					 The world public is lavishing praises with keen interest in the reality of the DPRK where a year is enough to change mountains and rivers and remarkable changes are taking place every day.
					
					 Screams and shrill cries are being made by the hostile forces without let-up at a time when the world is becoming vocal admiring and praising the validity and vitality of the above-said line of the DPRK.
					
					 The detailed report said that the DPRK's above-said line is not a temporary countermeasure for coping with the grave situation but serves as an immortal banner meeting the supreme interests of the revolution and providing a firm guarantee for the eternal future of the nation. It continued:
					
					 It is a revolutionary strategy and landmark of the WPK to achieve a final victory in the decisive battle with the U.S. imperialists, a sacred war for national reunification and the building of a thriving socialist nation without fail through the simultaneous development of the two fronts.
					
					 Rosy is the future of the DPRK which gets stronger with nukes and achieves great happiness through economic development.
					
					 The servicepersons and people of the DPRK will as ever consolidate the treasured sword of nuclear deterrent for self-defence which constitutes the life of the nation and a national treasure of reunified Korea that can never be bartered for anything, holding higher the banner of the line under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, and dynamically advance towards the high eminence of a thriving nation by the efforts of the Koreans, in the spirit of Korea and at its speed.

articles.title: New Strategic Line Foils Anti-DPRK Moves: Scholar
articles.content:
New Strategic Line Foils Anti-DPRK Moves: Scholar
Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- It has been three years since the new strategic line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force was advanced in the DPRK (March 31, 2013.)
					 In this regard, Associate Professor Ri Ho of Kim Il Sung University told KCNA:
					
					 During the last three years, the U.S.-led hostile forces, seized with inveterate repugnancy toward the DPRK, have intensified the moves to politically isolate the DPRK, hardened economic sanctions and blockades and committed unheard-of military provocations against it.
					
					 The DPRK answered with its successful H-bomb test to their moves to prevent it from getting access to nukes and with construction of world-level edifices to their economic sanctions.
					
					 UPI said that the West cried for pressure on the DPRK over its H-bomb test, but the number of tourists to the Masikryong Ski Resort in the DPRK, built under the deep care of supreme leader Kim Jong Un, has increased by far than the previous year, a proof that sanctions against the DPRK produce no desired effect.
					
					 Joseph Dethomas, former assistant secretary of the U.S. Department of State who is professor on international affairs of Pennsylvania University, said in an article that the "sanctions" against the DPRK is little short of hammering in vain. The U.S., south Korea and Japan switched over to the policy of additional sanctions to force the DPRK to scrap its nuclear and missile programs but they had better desist from expecting any results as it is unrealistic, the article added.
					
					 The three-year-long history clearly showed that the strategic line chosen by Songun (military-first) Korea is the way to self-reliance and self-development and sure victory, not the way to "isolation" and "collapse" loudmouthed by the hostile forces.
					
					 They should be mindful that their anti-DPRK moves will end in smoke since the DPRK adheres to this line.

articles.title: DPRK Strives to Secure Water Resources
articles.content:
DPRK Strives to Secure Water Resources
Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- It is getting momentum in the DPRK to secure water resources.
					 Prospecting groundwater resources has been steadily carried on together with the introduction of gravity-fed water supply system in different parts of the country.
					
					 Importance is attached to properly managing barrages, filling reservoirs and preserving intake works.
					
					 Efforts have also been paid to apply water-saving farming method and drip irrigation. 
					
					 Meanwhile, the DPRK government pays deep attention to prevention of water pollution.
					
					 Water purification facilities have been upgraded, fodder-saving fishing methods introduced at fish farms and waste-water well treated to prevent pollution of rivers.
					
					 In particular, Pyongyang City is taking the lead in preventing water pollution by improving the processes of precipitation, filtration and decontamination.

articles.title: World Public Hail DPRK's New Line of Developing Two Fronts
articles.content:
World Public Hail DPRK's New Line of Developing Two Fronts
Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Media and personages in the world have favored the DPRK's new line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					 This strategic line was advanced by the Workers' Party of Korea in March Juche 102 (2013), and its validity has been displayed in the recent showdown of three years with the U.S. imperialists wielding a nuclear stick.
					
					 The Uruguayan newspaper La Juventud said in an article:
					
					 It is a quite reasonable and wise choice that the DPRK decided to bolster up the nuclear force qualitatively and quantitatively under the grave situation in which the U.S., the world's biggest nuclear weapons state, has posed an escalating nuclear threat to it.
					
					 The new strategic line is the most realistic one suited to the actual conditions of the DPRK whose goal is to build a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The world will clearly see the DPRK successfully build a thriving socialist nation while mercilessly smashing the imperialists and their followers' threat of war by dint of its powerful deterrent.
					
					 The Venezuelan newspaper Vea said:
					
					 After the DPRK conducted an H-bomb test the world has wondered over how the DPRK could develop the updated technology, a monopoly of big powers.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un said that the DPRK's H-bomb test is a self-defensive measure to reliably ensure peace of the Korean Peninsula and regional security from the U.S.-led imperialists' nuclear threat.
					
					 The test is an essential and normal process for defending the sovereignty of the country and vital rights of the nation from outsiders' threat.
					
					 The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany posted an article on its website:
					
					 Through their protracted struggle, the Korean people have experienced the truth of history that self-development makes one a victor; lack of it makes one a slave and that a powerful state is characterized by the greatness of its leader, the might of single-minded unity and tremendous military strength.
					
					 The first H-bomb explosion in the DPRK, three years after the adoption of its new line, jolted the world.
					
					 The chairman of the Al Hadi Islam Propaganda Organization of Iran said:
					
					 The DPRK ranked itself among the advanced nuclear weapons states by succeeding in the H-bomb test, a noteworthy event that demonstrated its inexhaustible military strength before the world.
					
					 The U.S. threatening offensive will never take effect on the DPRK as it is wisely led by respected His Excellency Kim Jong Un and has tremendous military strength.
					
					 Takashi Nada, representative of the Ehime Institute for Contemporary Korean Issue in Japan, said:
					
					 It is quite legitimate for the DPRK to make a choice of access to nukes in defence of the nation's dignity and sovereignty from the U.S. daily-escalating nuclear threat and blackmail.
					
					 I pay respects to the party and people of the DPRK vigorously advancing under the new line of simultaneously developing the two fronts.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Urges U.S. to Face up to Trend of Times
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Urges U.S. to Face up to Trend of Times
Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Army chief of Staff at a recent hearing of the Congress confessed that the U.S. is not ready for a war against the DPRK and, therefore, can hardly win the war.
					 Earlier, world media said that the U.S. would come to believe the DPRK's access to working nuclear devices and mobile long-range delivery means before long and the latter's declaration to blow up the former's cities is by no means bluffing, advising the U.S. administration to roll back its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 This can be interpreted as a comparatively proper judgment of the trend of the times as it heralded that the U.S. would meet the fate of final doom because it is engrossed in aggression and interference, keen to realize its wild ambition for world domination.
					
					 The U.S. is working hard to mount a preemptive attack on the DPRK with its various type strategic and tactical weapons involved after kicking off the largest-ever war rehearsals in south Korea. This is, in fact, a bluffing of the weak and last-ditch effort of those at the death's door.
					
					 It is staging such grave military actions as "beheading operation" and "operation for advancing into Pyongyang" in a bid to totally stifle the independent DPRK. It is, however, failing to judge what catastrophic consequences would be entailed by the saber-rattling.
					
					 The U.S. possessed A-bombs in the 1950s but was defeated by the DPRK equipped with rifles only. It brought about the beginning of a downhill turn for the U.S.
					
					 The might of the DPRK has grown remarkably stronger than what it used to be in the period of the Korean War.
					
					 The DPRK is the only country fully ready for an all-out war against the U.S. with the firm will and capability to mercilessly punish it.
					
					 It succeeded in H-bomb test and miniaturized nuclear weapons and is manufacturing strategic weapons requiring ultra-modern technology by relying on the Juche-oriented defence industry despite hostile forces' unprecedented sanctions and pressure. It is also equipped with latest military hardware such as various type guided missiles with high accuracy, modern tanks, armored cars, multiple rocket launchers, drones and battle ships.
					
					 The Strategic Force of the Korean People's Army has recently conducted a ballistic rocket launching drill in the way of exploding nuclear warhead in the designated altitude under the simulated conditions of attacking the ports in the enemy-controlled area to which overseas aggression forces would be hurled. This demonstrated its capability enough to destroy even USS Stennis nuclear aircraft carrier task force to pieces in a jiffy.
					
					 All the ultra-modern striking means of the DPRK are accurately targeted on the citadels of aggression.
					
					 The U.S. had better stop rash acts, paying heed to the above-said far-sighted public opinion.

articles.title: Minju Joson Condemns S. Korean Chief Executive for Making Sheer Sophism
articles.content:
Minju Joson Condemns S. Korean Chief Executive for Making Sheer Sophism
Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, traitor Park Geun Hye unleashed a tirade before the military bosses and riff-raffs in the "ceremony for commemorating the 'day of defending the West Sea'" held in Taejon, blustering that the north's nuclear development and provocation cannot be pardoned any longer and its increasing nuclear capability will bring about a irreversible misfortune and a numbness of economy.
					 Especially she said that it is DPRK's declaration of a nuclear attack against south Korea and the U.S. that it opened to the public the nuclear warheads designed and manufactured by its own strength and technology.
					
					 She went lengths of shouting herself hoarse calling for confrontation with the compatriots, while talking about "patriotism".
					
					 Minju Joson on Wednesday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This clearly shows that Park's last-ditch effort to get rid of the abyss of ruin has reached the height.
					
					 The U.S. is the only nuclear criminal that used nuclear bombs in the world and is threatening other countries and nations with their use.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear deterrent for self-defense is a just treasured sword for firmly defending the destiny of the country and nation from the increasing anti-DPRK nuclear blackmail imposed by the U.S.
					
					 If the DPRK had not developed the nuclear deterrent for self-defense despite all difficulties and trials, the Korean nation would have fallen victim to the U.S. heinous hostile policy toward the DPRK long ago.
					
					 Nevertheless, it is sheer sophism that Park, who committed unpardonable crimes in league with foreign forces, is speaking ill of the DPRK's nuclear deterrent.
					
					 The DPRK's service personnel and people will increase the toughest offensive until the Park Geun Hye group of traitors committing unpardonable crimes before the nation meets ruin.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slashes at Japanese Reactionaries' Moves to Distort Criminal History
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slashes at Japanese Reactionaries' Moves to Distort Criminal History
Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- A short time ago, the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan impudently marked Tok Islets, part of inviolable territory of Korea, as "territory belonging to Japan" in the eight of ten textbooks for the students of high schools to be used from spring next year. The textbooks also contain the contents negating the crimes related to sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army in the past.
					 Minju Joson in a commentary Wednesday says that this is the height of impudence that can be done only by the cunning Japanese reactionaries working with bloodshot eyes only to devise the whole gamut of gimmick to deny their past crime-woven history at any cost.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 They are attempting to embellish their history of aggression stained with killing, plunder and thrice-cursed atrocities and to imbue the new generation with it.
					
					 They are steeped in their foolish ambition to realize at any cost their old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere" by repeating the past history when they ran amuck in continental aggression while fluttering blood-stained sun flag. 
					
					 To this end they visited "Yasukuni Shrine" in group despite unanimous protest and rebuff of the Korean people and the world public in a bid to paint the war criminals who died dog's death in the continental aggression as "patriots." They are also reviving militarism across Japan through reckless joint military drills by joining the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday which path the young students tainted with militarism would take.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should be well aware of the fact that their above-said moves would make a mess of Japan's future.

articles.title: KPA Will Shower Baptism of Fire upon Citadel of Enemy: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
KPA Will Shower Baptism of Fire upon Citadel of Enemy: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and south Korean warmongers obsessed with a foolish ambition staged such ridiculous drill under the simulated conditions of "precision strike at the office of the headquarters of the DPRK". This is the last-ditch effort of those at death beds.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in an article.
					
					 Noting that the victory of the great Paektusan nation has been pointed to the Chongwadae and the White House, the article goes on:
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK are the matchless strong army which has glorified the history of sure victory by the war methods of Paektu under the outstanding and brilliant commanders.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists armed to the teeth were defeated by the mysterious and preeminent guerrilla war methods of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) led by President Kim Il Sung, legendary hero of the anti-Japanese struggle. The Japanese imperialists' daydream of establishing the "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere" ended in the shameful defeat of the one-million strong Kwantung Army which described the KPRA as no more than "a drop in the ocean". Its war criminals are now entombed in Yaskuni Shrine. 
					
					 World people commented that the Korean War was a war between rifle and A-bomb. The Korean People's Army, however, put an end to the "doctrine of weapon almighty" of the U.S. imperialists and attained the great victory in the war by the war method of Paektu, true to the outstanding military idea and strategy of the President.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists have desperately persisted in unprecedented political and economic blockade and pressure and military threats to the DPRK to isolate and stifle it for the past several decades. But they could not escape a disgraceful defeat before the mysterious strategy and tactics of Juche Korea under the distinguished leadership of the great Songun brilliant commanders.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists and the Park Geun Hye group of traitors make last-ditch provocations, lost to all senses, the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army will shower merciless retaliatory blows on the enemies' strongholds and thus reduce them to ashes and finally liberate the southern half of Korea.

articles.title: No Force Can Stop DPRK's Conquer of Space: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
No Force Can Stop DPRK's Conquer of Space: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The space development for peaceful purposes is an independent and legitimate right of Juche Korea, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The DPRK's action for conquering the space is a serious politically-motivated confrontation for achieving the independence and justice of mankind. 
					
					 The issue of the DPRK's satellite launch is not boiled down to the character of the satellite and the method of its launch and it is, in essence, an acute political and class struggle decisive of independence or subordination, progress or reactionary action.
					
					 No one can turn back the wheel of history.
					
					 Our satellite reflects the nation's dignity and sovereignty that can not be bartered for anything. It represents an ardent aspiration and future of mankind desirous of independence and justice, freedom and equality on our planet.
					
					 The DPRK has always carried on the struggle for preserving the sovereignty and felt a sense of heavy yet moral mission before the era and mankind.
					
					 The Korean people have turned out in a decisive battle with the reactionaries of the history to put an end to the U.S. imperialists' offensive to stifle the DPRK and build a free and peaceful world.
					
					 Independence, progress and socialism will judge domination, reactionary elements and capitalism. Under such situation, the confrontation with the U.S. will drop its curtain with the final destruction of the empire of evils going down after facing death sentence.
					
					 We proudly say that the road of conquering the space is the one of independence to destroy the international order of high-handed and arbitrary practices and to establish the order of independent people.
					
					 The DPRK's action for conquering the space is the road of revolution, independence and self-support before one for science. 
					
					 The Juche-oriented satellite will steadily put into the space at the time and place determined by the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The DPRK will soar, ushering in the dawn of a free and peaceful century.

articles.title: Final Ruin of American Empire Is Inescapable: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Final Ruin of American Empire Is Inescapable: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The chief of Staff of the U.S. Army in a report on the combat efficiency of the U.S. forces released at a recent Senate Armed Services Committee hearing said that the U.S. can not win the war with the DPRK if the former starts a war with military powers including the DPRK, China and Russia at any moment as the combat capability of the U.S. forces is far from the required level.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 It is an undeniable stark fact that the U.S. is weak as the U.S. military boss confessed.
					
					 The U.S. boasted that its mainland's security environment has never been threatened. But it has become an old story as different countries have developed ultra-modern strike weapons. This is something shocking to the U.S. as it has existed through aggression and grown corpulent through wars.
					
					 Tragedy is that the U.S. is not likely to admit that its foolish policy of strength is on the verge of bankruptcy as it is still blinded with doctrine of weapon almighty.
					
					 In recent years tones of arguments claiming the end of the era dominated by the U.S. and its decline are ceaselessly heard from various parts of the world, but the American ruling circles arrogantly insist that it will "lead" the world as ever.
					
					 The U.S. should pay heed to the public opinion deriding its sinking position and opt for making a courageous decision to withdraw its forces from overseas military bases, south Korea, in particular.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists ignite a war on this land, refusing to quit south Korea, the DPRK will compel the American empire to write a miserable history of final defeat.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Ridicules U.S.-S. Korea "High-level Consultation on Sanctions"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Ridicules U.S.-S. Korea "High-level Consultation on Sanctions"
Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Recently, the south Korean puppet forces held a "high-level consultation on sanctions for thorough implementation of fresh UN sanctions resolution" against the DPRK together with the U.S. in Seoul. At the end of the consultation the puppet group bluffed that there would be "stronger counteraction" in case of "additional provocation."
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 What the U.S. and the Park Geun Hye regime discussed over the "sanctions" against the DPRK is nothing but a ridiculous charade of the blind who knows nothing and can hardly do about the invincible national power and tremendous potential of the DPRK.
					
					 They are sadly mistaken if they calculate they can do anything through such "sanctions".
					
					 The DPRK has consolidated its foundation for self-supporting national economy and self-reliant national defence with its indigenous resources, technology and efforts, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 Its first successful H-bomb test and successful launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 are a clear proof of its invincible national power and tremendous potentials. World people are admired and envied to see the DPRK building lots of monumental edifices of lasting value and manufacturing strategic weapons and arms equipment requiring ultra-modern technology as it pleases despite unprecedented "sanctions" and pressure of hostile forces. History and reality clearly prove that neither "sanctions" nor pressure is workable on the DPRK.
					
					 It says the sparrow near the school sings the primer. Though one may be an idiot or fool bereft of faculty to discern things, one has to be aware of one's misjudgment.

articles.title: Seoul High Court Admits Illegality of Spy-ring Case
articles.content:
Seoul High Court Admits Illegality of Spy-ring Case
Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The Seoul High Court of south Korea on March 25 admitted the illegality of the brother and sister spy-ring case fabricated by the then Security Planning Board (SPB) in 1993.
					 In September,1993 the SPB arrested Kim Sam Sok, policy member of the Alliance for Movement for Peace against Nukes, and his younger sister Kim Un Ju on the suspicion of "spy" for the purpose of stamping out the forces for reunification and democracy in south Korea and creating the anti-reunification atmosphere.
					
					 The fascist authorities sentenced them to prison terms, claming that they visited Japan to have contact with "pro-north organizations" to receive "funds for activities" and hand over secret military information.
					
					 However, Paek Hung Yong, who was directly involved in fabricating the case, made public a declaration of conscience to bring the truth behind the case into bolder relief.
					
					 That day the court authorities in a trial officially admitted the illegality of the case.

articles.title: S. Korean Students Condemn Ruling Forces for Insulting Victims of April 3 Uprising
articles.content:
S. Korean Students Condemn Ruling Forces for Insulting Victims of April 3 Uprising
Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Students in Jeju, south Korea held a press conference in Jeju City on March 26 at which they demanded a halt to the reexamination of the victims of the April 3 Uprising.
					 Speakers termed the conservative forces' ceaseless call for reexamining the victims of the April 3 Uprising an act of insulting the participants in the uprising.
					
					 They accused Park Geun Hye of absenting herself from the ceremony for honoring the memory of the victims of the uprising under the pretext of her overseas tour.
					
					 Prior to the press conference, students staged a demo against the reexamination of the victims of the uprising.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Accuse Japanese Reactionaries of Enforcing "Security Legislation"
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Accuse Japanese Reactionaries of Enforcing "Security Legislation"
Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- About 40 organizations of south Korea on Tuesday held a press conference outside the Japanese embassy in Seoul on March 29 denouncing the Japanese reactionaries for their enforcement of the "security legislation", according to the south Korean internet paper Thongil News.  They included the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, the Solidarity for Progress, the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, the Confederation of Trade Unions, the Federation of Peasants Associations, the Youth Solidarity, the Buddhist Peace Solidarity and the Missionary Solidarity Council of Christian Society.
					 At the press conference, the speakers said that Japan has entered the phase of enforcing the "security legislation" on the same day.
					
					 Therefore, Japan is capable of exercising the "right to collective self-defense" and fighting a war, they charged.
					
					 They brought to light the danger of the "security legislation" and declared that they will steadily conduct the actions in protest against it.
					
					 A press release was read out at the conference. As Japan's "security legislation" has entered the phase of its enforcement, the "Self-Defense Forces" can interfere in military affairs anywhere in the world following in footsteps of the U.S. forces and concern can not but be raised over the fact that the first target is the Korean peninsula, it noted.
					
					 It demanded the immediate abrogation of Japan's war law that may bring the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the peninsula.

articles.title: Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Khabarovsk
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Khabarovsk
Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was inaugurated in Khabarovsk, Russia on March 24.
					 Alexandr Gromov, first secretary of the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize various political and cultural events such as a seminar and film show to praise the revolutionary careers and undying exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the meeting.

articles.title: Int'l Preparatory Committee for Celebrating Day of Sun Formed
articles.content:
Int'l Preparatory Committee for Celebrating Day of Sun Formed
Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- An international preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung) and the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea was formed by the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions on March 26.
					 Mikhail Panchenko, general secretary of the alliance, and Dmitri Kostenko, chairman of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, were elected co-chairmen of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold diverse events in East European and Central Asian countries on those occasions.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Support DPRK's Stand
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Support DPRK's Stand
Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on March 23 made public a joint statement in support of the crucial report of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK).
					 The statement said the CPRK released the crucial report as regards the fact that the reckless military provocations of the U.S. imperialists and the pro-U.S. Park Geun Hye group of traitors of south Korea against the DPRK have gone beyond the tolerance limit.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The servicepersons and people of the DPRK are on standby to blow up the Chongwadae, where Park Geun Hye is nesting, with an ultra-precision strike at any time.
					
					 All the armed forces of the DPRK including the Korean People's Army are determined to liberate the whole of south Korea and wipe out the pro-U.S. group of traitors to the last one once a war breaks out.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet regime should keep in mind that the DPRK's warning is not hot air.
					
					 We fully support the crucial report of the CPRK and denounce the criminal war games of the U.S. imperialists and Park Geun Hye group.

articles.title: DR Congo Organization Praises WPK's Revolutionary History
articles.content:
DR Congo Organization Praises WPK's Revolutionary History
Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo posted an article titled "Under guidance of Workers' Party of Korea" on its website on March 13.
					 Introducing the decades-long proud history of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the article said:
					
					 The WPK's history of guidance over the revolution represents the leadership history of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il over the revolution.
					
					 The guiding idea and historical roots of the WPK and its founding and development were all provided by the great leaders and the undisputed dignity and prestige of the WPK are linked to the august names of the great leaders.
					
					 Now the WPK is carrying forward the idea and cause of the great leaders generation after generation and dynamically advancing towards the final victory under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Under the guidance of the outstanding leader and the great party the DPRK will emerge as the most powerful country, where the beautiful dreams and ideals of the popular masses will come true in the near future.

articles.title: On-line Seminar on Kim Il Sung's Exploits Held in Russia
articles.content:
On-line Seminar on Kim Il Sung's Exploits Held in Russia
Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- An on-line seminar on the exploits of President Kim Il Sung took place in Russia on the occasions of the Day of the Sun (his birth anniversary) and the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Taking part in the seminar were members of the preparatory committee of the Russian organizations for the study of the Juche idea to celebrate the Day of the Sun and the Seventh Congress of the WPK.
					
					 Pavel Bilevski, secretary general of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, said the Juche idea founded by the President serves as the guiding idea to be held fast to by the people of the countries aspiring after socialism.
					
					 Elena Bavichi, chairwoman of the Kim Jong Suk Women's Union of Russia, noted the works of the President have become a beacon illuminating the way for progressive mankind.
					
					 Yemeliyanenko, chief of the Krasnoyarsk branch of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, noted that the great brilliant commanders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il dedicated their all to the people, regarding it as their mottos to believe in the people as in Heaven.
					
					 Yuri Nersesov, chief of the Sankt-Peterburg branch of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, said the President paid great attention to intensifying the unity and cohesion of the party and revolutionary ranks.
					
					 Dmitri Kostenko, chairman of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, underlined the need to make positive efforts to significantly celebrate the Day of the Sun and the Seventh Congress of the WPK together with the Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Russian Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Russian Website
Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Usher in a Great Golden Age of Construction by Thoroughly Applying the Party's Juche-Oriented Idea on Architecture" was posted on Irkutskblogspot. ru, a website in Irkutsk of Russia, on March 25.
					 The work, published on December 8, Juche 102 (2013), clarifies that the DPRK's history of construction is a proud one during which miracles and epochal changes were brought about thanks to the outstanding idea on architecture of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and their wise leadership.
					
					 It also sets forth the tasks facing the construction sector and ways to carry them out.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Algeria
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Algeria
Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was inaugurated by the General Union of the Algerian Workers on March 23.
					 Ahmed Katichi, secretary for international relations of the General Union of the Algerian Workers, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize various events to praise the revolutionary exploits of the President on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Ecuador
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Ecuador
Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- An Ecuadorian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was inaugurated in Quito on March 22.
					 Daniel Alvarez Celi, chairman of the Ecuadorian Committee for Supporting Korea's Independent and Peaceful Reunification, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to arrange colorful political and cultural events such as a meeting and seminar in praise of the revolutionary career and exploits of the President on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Pak Pyong Sik
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Pak Pyong Sik
Pyongyang, 30 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio el dia 29 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Pak Pyong Sik, laureado con el Premio Kim Il Sung, Heroe del Trabajo, profesor titular, doctor e investigador y profesor guia de la Academia Militar Politica Kim Il Sung, en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: Premier coreano expresa condolencias a su homologo pakistani
articles.content:
Premier coreano expresa condolencias a su homologo pakistani
Pyongyang, 30 de marzo (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju envio el dia 29 un mensaje de condolencias a su homologo pakistani, Muhammad Nawaz Sharif, en relacion con que hubo muchas perdidas humanas en Lahore, Pakistan, por el ataque terrorista.
					En el mensaje el expreso profundas condolencias y simpatia a las victimas y sus familiares, aclaro de nuevo la posicion del gobierno de la RPDC contra todo tipo de terrorismo y deseo que el gobierno y el pueblo de Pakistan liquiden cuanto antes las consecuencias de la catastrofe tragica y rescaten la estabilidad.

articles.title: CC de PTC felicita 14o aniversario de PPRD de Congo Democratico
articles.content:
CC de PTC felicita 14o aniversario de PPRD de Congo Democratico
Pyongyang, 30 de marzo (ACNC) -- En ocasion del 14o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido Popular por la Reconstruccion y la Democracia del Congo Democratico, el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea remitio el dia 30 un mensaje de felicitacion al comite ejecutivo nacional de esa agrupacion.
					La misiva expreso la conviccion de que tambien en el futuro seguiran ampliandose y desarrollandose aun mas las excelentes relaciones de amistad y cooperacion existentes entre dos partidos conforme a los intereses de los pueblos de dos paises.
					
					Y desea mayores exitos en las actividades del partido por lograr la estabilidad sociopolitica, la unidad nacional y la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Tiene lugar novena sesion plenaria de XIII legislatura de Presidium de APS
articles.content:
Tiene lugar novena sesion plenaria de XIII legislatura de Presidium de APS
Pyongyang, 30 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 30 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae la novena  sesion plenaria de la XIII Legislatura del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Participaron ahi los miembros del Presidium de la APS.
					
					Y estuvieron presentes en calidad de observadores los funcionarios correspondientes. 
					
					La reunion hizo balance de la ejecucion del presupuesto estatal del 104 (2015) de la Era Juche y discutio el presupuesto estatal del 105 (2016) de la Era Juche, de la RPDC. 
					
					El informante dijo que en el ano pasado se ejecuto exactamente el presupuesto estatal y continuo:
					
					El plan de ingreso del presupuesto estatal se llevo a cabo en 101.3% y se aumento a 105% en comparacion con el ano anterior.
					
					El plan de ingreso del presupuesto local se cumplio en 113.8%, y el plan de egreso del presupuesto estatal se ejecuto en 99.9%.
					
					El 15.9% del monto total de egreso fue asignado como gastos militares, y el 47.5% fue usado para la construccion de la potencia economica y el mejoramiento de vida del pueblo.
					
					La inversion en la rama de las ciencias y tecnicas se incremento 4.7% mas que en el ano anterior.
					
					El 36.6% fue invertido en la construccion cultural para el desarrollo de la educacion, salud publica, deportes, literatura y arte. 
					
					El ingreso del presupuesto estatal se aumentara a 104.1% en comparacion con el ano anterior, de entre se preven un incremento de 3.3% en el ingreso de transacciones; 4.5% y 1.5%, en las ganancias de las empresas estatales y las entidades cooperativas, respectivamente; 4% en los pagos por el uso de propiedades inmuebles; 1.1% en el seguro social; 2.5% en el ingreso de venta de bienes y alteracion de precios; 1.3% en los ingresos por otros; y 4.1% en el ingreso de las zonas economicas y comerciales. 
					
					Ocuparan 76.8% y 23.2%, respectivamente, los ingresos presupuestarios centrales y locales.
					
					El egreso del presupuesto estatal se aumentara a 105.6%, en comparacion con el ano pasado, de entre se incrementaran a 104.8%, 104.3%, 106.9%, 113.7% y 107.5%, respectivamente, los desembolsos para las ramas industrial, agricola y pesquera, la construccion principal y la selvicultura.
					
					Y se creceran a 105.2%, 108.1%, 103.8%, 104.1% y 107.4%, respectivamente, los egresos para las ramas de las ciencias y tecnicas, la educacion, la salud publica, los deportes y la cultura.
					
					Sera destinado a la defensa nacional el 15.8% del monto total del egreso presupuestario y se asignaran muchos fondos como subsidios escolares y becas para los hijos de coreanos residentes en Japon. 
					
					En la sesion plenaria fueron adoptadas la resolucion del Presidium de la APS "Sobre la aprobacion del balance de la ejecucion del presupuesto estatal del 104 (2015) de la Era Juche de la RPDC" y el decreto del Presidium de la APS "Sobre el presupuesto estatal del 105 (2016) de la Era Juche de la RPDC".

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun aboga por el derecho al desarrollo de cosmos con fines pacificos
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun aboga por el derecho al desarrollo de cosmos con fines pacificos
Pyongyang, 30 de marzo (ACNC) -- En un comentario individual divulgado el dia 30, Rodong Sinmun subraya que el desarrollo de cosmos con fines pacificos es el derecho independiente y legitimo de la Corea de Juche.
					La lucha de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea por conquistar el cosmos es una severa confrontacion politica para defender la independencia y la justicia de la humanidad, insiste el diario y continua:
					
					En su esencia, el problema de lanzamiento de satelite de la RPDC no es el simple problema relativo al caracter de satelite o el modo de lanzamiento, sino la aguda lucha politica y clasista que decide la independencia y la subyugacion, el progreso y la reaccion.
					
					Nadie puede devolver al reves las ruedas de la historia.
					
					Nuestro satelite contiene no solo la dignidad y la soberania de la nacion, sino tambien el ferviente deseo y el futuro de la humanidad aspirante a la independencia y justicia de nuestro planeta y el deseo y el futuro de la humanidad que desea la libertad y la imparcialidad. La RPDC que ha venido actuando de manera digna y despiadada en lucha por defender la soberania se siente de todo corazon la mision moral asumida ante la epoca y la humanidad.
					
					A fin de acabar con la larga ofensiva de aplastamiento de los imperialistas norteamericanos y construir un mundo libre y pacifico, la RPDC se presento en la batalla decisiva con los reaccionarios de la historia. La presente confrontacion antiyanqui, en que sentenciara la independencia a dominacion, el progreso a reaccion y el socialismo a capitalismo, terminara con la derrota final del imperio de males que esta arruinandose tras recibir la condena a muerte.
					
					El pueblo coreano dice con orgullo que el camino por la conquista del cosmos deviene la via para establecer la orden favorable para el pueblo independiente frustrando la orden internacional del despotismo y arbitrariedad.
					
					Este camino no es solo el sendero de ciencias, sino tambien el de la revolucion, la independencia y la autososten.
					
					Tambien en el futuro, el satelite de la RPDC se lanzara hacia el espacio en el tiempo y el lugar decididos por el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. La RPDC se levantara con rapidez llamando la aurora del siglo libre y pacifico.
